thread.title: Drake Shows Off His Under Construction Toronto Mansion
thread.title_full: Drake Shows Off His Under Construction Toronto Mansion

author: Zakk Feig
title: Drake Shows Off His Under Construction Toronto Mansion
text:
Home > Music > Drake Shows Off His Under Construction Toronto Mansion Drake Shows Off His Under Construction Toronto Mansion 2 1 Posted by Zakk Feig , Feb 18, 2017 at 06:35pm Drake gives fans a taste of his upcoming Toronto mansion. 
Drake runs Toronto, but soon the king of the city will have his very own 6ixside palace. Taking to Instagram to keep fans up to date, Drizzy dropped a photo of his under construction mansion, and it seems like Aubrey is very amped about it. A post shared by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Feb 17, 2017 at 6:43pm PST 
The mansion has been designed by a man named Ferris Rafauli, the mastermind designer behind the Sher Club, Drake's exclusive members-only lounge at Toronto's Air Canada Centre. A post shared by Ferris Rafauli "FR" (@ferrisrafauli) on Oct 28, 2016 at 12:59pm PDT 
The neighborhood of Toronto where Drake decided to build his dream home is one called The Bridle Path, located in a section of the city called North York. It is reportedly the most affluent neighborhood in Canada. Once upon a time, late musical legend Prince had a mansion there, too. 
Despite Drizzy's IG acclamation, the rapper is not currently in Toronto, but rather, on tour in Europe. Tomorrow night he will be performing in Dublin, Ireland.
